author: dailytelegraph.com
title: NRL finals 2015: Sydney Roosters v Canterbury Bulldogs live score, live updates, live blog | DailyTelegraph
text:
IN a game that sizzled with controversy, the Roosters grabbed the second half momentum and ran with it to finish the Bulldogs’ season with a 38-12 smashing.
The biggest moment in the game came at the 51st minute mark when referee Matt Cecchin sent a ‘try’ call to be reviewed by the video ref and it wasn’t overturned despite what appeared to be clear evidence that Kane Evans grounded the ball before the try line and rolled it forward.
From that moment on the Roosters flew to the finish line with some scintillating attacking football that blew away the devastated Dogs.
